src_text: Mmotlolo wa Tlhabollo yeo e Theilwego Seleteng
trg_text: District Based Development Model

src_text: Kabinete e amogela thakgolo semmu o ka Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa, ya Mmotlolo wa Tlhabollo yeo e Theilwego Seleteng wo mofsa mo Mmasepaleng wa Selete wa OR Tambo, ka Kapa Bohlabel Mmotlolo o kopant ha dikarolo t e tharo t a mmu o go
trg_text: Cabinet welcomes the official launch by President Cyril Ramaphosa, of the new District Based Development Model in the OR Tambo District Municipality, in the Eastern Cap The model brings together the three spheres of government to collaborate, cooperate and integrate their work with special reference to the district to address developmental challenges and promote service delivery, localised procurement and job creatio This model was endorsed by Cabinet, local government structures, traditional authorities and the President s Coordinating Council (PCC).

src_text: Pego e tla alwa Samiting ya SDG nakong ya Kopanokakaret o ya UN (UNGA) ya bo 74 ka Lewedi 2012 Pego ke set welet wa sa go kgatha tema go gogolo ga dikgoro t a lekala, Dipalopalo t a Afrika Borwa, dirutegi le mekgatlo ya dit haba t a sega E aba t welopele ya naga mo go phethagat eng dinepo t a SDG, t eo di sepelelanago le NDP ya ren Ka morago ga ge pego ya naga e adilwe mo UN, set haba se tla kgona go e hwet a mo wepsaeteng ya UAfrika Borwa e dula e ikgafile go kgatha tema go lebelet we lenaneo la 2020 la lefase ka tlhabollo yeo e swarelelago ya lefas Di-SDG di na le dinepo t e 17 le dilebanywa t e 169 t eo di lati i ago mohlwaela wo mogolo wa ditaba go t wa go thuto, bohloki go ya go ditaba t a tikologo, kgolo ya ekonomi le go se lekalekane ga bong mo lefasengProthokholo ya Cartagena ya Polokego ya DiphediKabinete e dumelet e pego ya Set haba ya Bone ya Afrika Borwa ya phethagat o ya Prothokholo ya Cartagena ya Polokego ya Diphed Pego e tla i wa go Mongwaledi wa Tumelelano ya Phapano ya Diphedi ka la 1 Diphalane 2012 Prothokholo ya Cartagena e laola mosepelo wa diphedi t eo di fetot wego t a go phela, t eo di tsebegago gape ka gore ke Diphedi t eo e Sego t a Tlhago t eo di Hlot wego ke Batho (di-GMO), ka mo nageng le dinageng t e dingwAfrika Borwa e na le maswanedi ka botlalo ka dinyakwa t a Prothokholo ya Cartagen Tlhako ya taolo ya polokego ya diphedi ya naga e laola dit welet wa t a GMO t e di tsenago le t e di t wago ka nagen Afrika Borwa e kgatha tema gape mo go hlahleng ba omi i ka moka ba di-GMO ka nageng le ka dinageng t a mabapiTlhako ya Phethagat o ya Seriti ya Mengato ya Lehlapo (SDIF)Kabinete e dumelet e SDIF ye e ngwadilweng lesw Phethagat o ya tlhako ye e fa tokelo ya molaotheo ya seriti le tokelo ya bophelo go basadi le basetsana go t wa malapeng a go hlokDitlhahli t a SDIF ka ga theko ya dit welet wa t a mengato ya lehlapo; mokgwa wa go aba mengato ya lehlapo; go lahlwa ga mengato ya lehlapo le tlhako ya institu ene go laola kabo ya mengato ya lehlap Di fa gape tlhahlo le taolo ya maphelo go baholegi ba dit welet wa t a lehlapMo tshepet ong ka moka ya t a Matlotlo a Boset haba, tekanet o e abet we ngwaga wo wa dit helete le mengwaga ya ka ntl Go se patele lekgetho la dit welet wa t a mengato ya lehlapo le yona e thomile go

src_text: MahlokoKabinete e romela melaet a ya mahloko go: Balapa le bagwera ba Motlat atona wa Kgoro ya Diminerale le Enet i, Mohumagadi Bavelile Hlongwa, yoo a hlokafet ego kotsing ya sefatanaga mmogo le malapa a batho ba bane bao ba hlokafet ego le yena ge ba be ba leka go thu a banamedi bao ba bego ba amegile kotsing ye nngw Batho le mmu o wa Repabliki ya Zimbabwe go latela go hlokofala ga Mopresidente wa maloba Robert Gabriel Mugab Ka fase ga boetapele bja Mopresidente Mugabe, Zimbabwe e swarelet e gomme ya lwa ntwa ntle le let hogo kgahlanong le bokoloni ya hlohlelet a ntwa ya rena kgahlanong le mmu o wa kgethollo gomme ya re fa tshepo ya gore Afrika Borwa le yona e tla lokolog Balapa le bagwera ba moraloki wa maloba wa rugby wa Springbok Chester Mornay Williams yoo a tumi it wego mo gae le lefaseng ka moka ka tema yeo a e kgathilego go phenyo ya Afrika Borwa ka Mogopo wa Lefase wa Rugby wa 1995.

src_text: Me ongwana ya gagwe mo karolong ya papadi e hlohleledit e bafsa go dinepo le ditoro t a bon Mopresidente Ramaphosa o hlomphile mogale wa rugby yo a fetilego ka go mo fa Poloko ya Semmu o ya Profense ya Go ikgetha ya Legoro la Bobed Balapa le bagwera ba mogolegwa wa maloba wa Robben Island le mahlwaadibona wa Kapa Bohlabela Vincent Dib Mopresidente Ramaphosa o mo file Poloko ya Profense ya Go ikgetha ya Legoro la Bobedi, yeo e akaret ago dibopego t a moletlo t eo di tla abjago ke SAP Balapa le bagwera ba molwant ha kgethollo Adelaine Hain

src_text: omile gabotse ka go lwant ha kgethollo gomme a thu a batho bao ba bego ba gatelet we - boikgafo bjoo bo dirilego gore mmu o wa kgethollo o mo ilet e ke moka ka morago wa ilet a monna wa gagwe, Walter, pele o ba gapelet a go ba bafaladi ka United Kingdom Ditebogi o Kabinete e na le set haba le Afrika gape go lebogi a Ndlovu Youth Choir, ka ge ba fihlelet e makgaolakgang mo phadi anong ya America s Got Talen Khwaere ye e dut e e dira gore naga le kontinente di ikgant he ka yona mo nakong ya phadi ano ka mok Oratilwe AJ Hlongwane yoo a tsebegago gabotse bjalo ka DJ Arch Jnr yoo a thopilego sefoka sa South Africa s Got Talent ka 2015 ge a be a na le mengwga ye merar The Guinness World Records e mo tsebi it e semmu o bjalo ka DJ ye nnyane go feta ka moka ka 2017, O laledit we go kgatha tema dinageng t e dint i gomme o phagami a folaga ya Afrika Borwa ka tiragat o ya gagwe ya go makat a mo pont hong ya Britain s Got Talent: The Champion Re mo lakalet a t e dibotsDipot i o:Mohumagadi Phumla Williams
